title: [Biology] 41 studies (including 2 randomized studies) prove that a Vitamin D deficiency increases Covid 19 's infection severity, likelihood & mortality. Data shows supplementation weakens the infection, reduces it's duration, lowers mortality rate & improves outcomes.

[Epidemiology] More than a third of kids who have COVID-19 don't show symptoms, according to new U of A research. The study also showed that the most reliable indicators of infection among kids with symptoms are loss of taste and smell, headaches, fever, and nausea and vomiting.
